results.title: Turning Point for Garland as Justice Dept. Grapples With Trump Inquiries
results.abstract: After months of an already hyperpartisan political environment, the attorney general appears to be acknowledging that his approach has to be recalibrated.

results.title: When High Fashion and QAnon Collide
results.abstract: Two new Balenciaga campaigns ignited a firestorm that traveled from the internet to Fox News, fueled by allegations that the brand condoned child exploitation.

media.caption: The fallout began on Nov. 16, when Balenciaga published a campaign called Balenciaga Gift Shop, which featured images of children with the brand’s handbags that look like teddy bears in bondage gear.

results.title: Irene Cara, ‘Fame’ and ‘Flashdance’ Singer, Dies at 63
results.abstract: Ms. Cara was a child star from the Bronx who gained fame in the 1980s as a singer of pop anthems and as the star of the movie “Fame.”

media.caption: Irene Cara as Coco Hernandez performing in a scene from the 1980 movie “Fame.” A former child actor, dancer and singer, she was the voice behind two of the biggest movie theme songs of the 1980s.
